logic.logicTransfer

Interface GUI2Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Game

    public interface GUI2Game
    defines the methods needed by the FXMLController for reacting to the users input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      the current Domino (that is shown in choose-box) is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise and shown.
      void disposeCurrDomino()
      Disposes the Human player's selected domino (this.currDomino)

      Needed to check if the saved file is on the most recent state or if it needs to be updated before any new instance can be loaded.

      checks if the current chosen domino fits at the position.

      Moves Board one box in the given direction
      void selectDomOnCurrBank(int idx)
      Selects a domino from the current bank, for human player the domino will be put into the special box to rotate if necessary.
      void selectDomOnNextBank(int idx)
      Selects a domino from the next bank, for human player the domino will be put into the special box to rotate if necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • boxClicked

        void boxClicked()
        the current Domino (that is shown in choose-box) is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise and shown. If the clickOnPlayersBank-box is empty and a cell of the current players bank is empty a new domino is dealt and shown in the box. If the choose-box is empty and the players bank full, the next player is to move.

      • fits

        boolean fits(Pos pos)
        checks if the current chosen domino fits at the position.
        Parameters:
        pos - position describes the top-left halfs position
        Returns:
        true, if the current chosen domino fits at the position.

      • disposeCurrDomino

        void disposeCurrDomino()
        Disposes the Human player's selected domino (this.currDomino)

      • setOnBoard

        void setOnBoard(Pos pos)
        puts the current Domino to the given position on board and removes it from the choose-box and switches to the next player.

        Parameters:
        pos - position to which the human players current domino will be put

      • startGame

        void startGame(PlayerType[] playerTypes,
               int sizeX,
               int sizeY)
        clears the board. deals the dominos to the banks.
        gets one of the stacks dominos and sets it to the middle of the board.
        human player starts.
        Parameters:
        playerTypes - array of playertypes that will be instanciated during the starting process of the game
        sizeX - width of every players' board
        sizeY - height of the players' board

      • selectDomOnCurrBank

        void selectDomOnCurrBank(int idx)
        Selects a domino from the current bank, for human player the domino will be put into the special box to rotate if necessary.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the domino on the current bank that will be selected

      • selectDomOnNextBank

        void selectDomOnNextBank(int idx)
        Selects a domino from the next bank, for human player the domino will be put into the special box to rotate if necessary.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the domino on the next bank that will be selected

      • moveBoard

        void moveBoard(Board.Direction dir)
        Moves Board one box in the given direction
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to which the board will be moved

      • equalsStr

        boolean equalsStr(java.lang.String input)
        Needed to check if the saved file is on the most recent state or if it needs to be updated before any new instance can be loaded. //TODO ueberarbeiten.
        Parameters:
        input - input to check
        Returns:
        true if the saved file is on the most recent state or if it needs to be updated before any new instance can be loaded.
